name: Dal Baati Churma
recipe: Mix wheat flour with ghee and water to make a dough. Shape into balls and bake. Cook chana dal with spices. Crush the baked balls and mix with ghee and sugar to make churma. Serve dal with baati and churma.

name: Gatte ki Sabzi
recipe: Prepare dough with gram flour and spices, shape into cylinders and boil. Cut into pieces and fry. Cook a gravy with yogurt, spices, and tomatoes. Add the fried gatte to the gravy and simmer.

name: Ker Sangri
recipe: Soak ker and sangri overnight. Boil them and drain. Cook with spices and yogurt. Serve hot.

name: Laal Maas
recipe: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices. Cook red chilies and garlic in oil. Add mutton and cook until tender.

name: Pyaaz Kachori
recipe: Prepare dough with flour and water. Make a filling with onions and spices. Shape dough into balls, fill with onion mixture, and fry.

name: Mohanthal
recipe: Roast gram flour in ghee. Add milk and cook until thick. Add sugar and cardamom. Spread in a tray and cut into pieces.

name: Kalmi Vada
recipe: Soak chana dal and grind with spices. Shape into patties and fry.

name: Ghevar
recipe: Prepare a batter with flour, ghee, and milk. Deep fry in a mold. Soak in sugar syrup flavored with saffron.

name: Bajre ki Roti
recipe: Mix bajra flour with water to make a dough. Shape into flatbreads and cook on a griddle. Serve with ghee.

name: Churma Ladoo
recipe: Make dough with wheat flour and ghee, shape into balls and bake. Crush and mix with ghee, sugar, and cardamom. Shape into ladoos.
